mainText:
What an amazing,  wonderful and extraordinary human being.  He kept his 
spirits high and used his God given talents to the highest of standards. 
 I pray that those who were fortunate to work with him and know him will 
continue to work and love in the same way Steve did.  God bless his 
family for all the years they shared him with the world.
header: God Has One Of His Best
author: Lauren
